plays.text: Penalty to Stu Barnes 2 minutes for Tripping Andrei Markov
Goal scored by Jan Bulis assisted by Saku Koivu and Stephane Quintal
Penalty to Stephane Quintal 2 minutes for Tripping Vaclav Varada
Penalty to Chris Gratton 2 minutes for High Sticking Yanic Perreault
Goal scored by Vaclav Varada assisted by Dmitri Kalinin and Taylor Pyatt
Goal scored by Miroslav Satan assisted by Brian Campbell
